  3. 1PUNCH

One

Samuel

Introduction

1PUNCH was a hip-hop duo under Brave Entertainment and D-Business Entertainment. They debuted on January 23, 2015 with the single "Turn Me Back". On September 21, 2015, it was announced that the duo had disbanded after 1 signed with YG Entertainment, while Punch (now Sameul) had decided to debut as a soloist.
